title: Not Enough Ip To Buy Icon?
body: I have 790 ip and it cost 750 so I should be able to buy it but it says I do not have enough?

replies.body:
Yeah I had the same issue yesterday, but I thought it had been fixed?

Try reloading your client and it should fix itself.

If you want here's my post on the problem from yesterday: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/pH3Z6mOp-umm-says-i-dont-have-enough-ip-to-buy-the-caches?
Its a bug, try reloading your client and check again otherwise send a support ticket because i cannot help you any further
